short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the top level comments of a Reddit post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the top level Reddit comments of a Reddit post. Useful if you want to multi-task, or if you want to take a break from reading. To activate, just click the "Speak" button at the top right corner of a subreddit.
